name: Dementia
title: Dementia
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for dementia),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent dementia),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
